EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Kashif - Would you be interested in hearing about a platform that allows you to grow both your on-premise infrastructure and cloud environments in the most cost effective way possible? Turbonomic’s control platform allows infrastructure teams continue to grow out and scale their on-premise infrastructure by using automation to ensure that each workload is getting the resources it needs in real time, while also giving you cost insight into your public cloud investments. With the 5.9 release, Turbonomic can help you break down which templates are the most cost effective for spinning up workloads in a public cloud like AWS or Azure. Our customers use the automation to not only increase workload performance, but to also increase the efficiency of their infrastructure. Because of this they are able to spend significantly less on hardware year over year.
